titleStmt.title: [A commentarye vpon the prophet Malaky. M.D.LIII]
titleStmt.author: Gilby, Anthony, ca. 1510-1585.

notesStmt.note: Title and imprint from STC; copy catalogued lacks title page.
Running title reads: A commentary vpon the prophet Malachy.
Copy at reel 2065 lacks title page, leaves A8 and G8 and quires C, F, H, I and K.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
